EnergyAttrCertCredit.name: EnergyAttrCertCredit
EnergyAttrCertCredit.description: Represents information about the energy attribute certificate credits related to energy attribute certificate purchase.

CleanEnergyProjectId.description: The clean energy project related to the energy attribute certificate purchase that's associated with the purchase of energy attribute certificate credits.

CleanEnergyType.description: The clean energy type from clean energy project related to the energy attribute certificate purchase that's associated with the purchase of energy attribute certificate credits.

CostPerUnit.description: The cost of the credits for each unit of emissions.

CreditsAllocatedInMwh.description: The credits that are allocated to the emissions inventory of the organization measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

CreditsAvailableInMwh.description: The credits that are available after allocation measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

CreditsIssueDate.description: The date when the credits were issued.

CreditsPurchasedInMwh.description: The credits that are purchased by the organization measured in megawatt hour (MWh).

CreditsRetiredDate.description: The date when the credits are retired from the registry.

Description.description: The description of the energy attribute certificate credit record.

EnergyAttrCertPurchaseId.description: The energy attribute certificate purchase record that's associated with the purchase of energy attribute certificate credits.

IsRetired.description: Indicates whether the energy attribute certificate credit is retired (true) or not (false) so it can be allocated to the stationary asset energy use records.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the energy attribute certificate credit record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PurchaseDate.description: The date when the energy attribute certificate credits were purchased.

SupplierId.description: The name of the organization responsible for supplying the energy attribute certificate credits.

TotalCost.description: The total amount spent on the credits.

VintagePeriod.description: The period when the energy attribute certificate credits were issued.
